data.content: Crea un chatbot para hacer reservas de hoteles.

To create a chatbot for hotel reservations using Taskyto, we will need to define several modules, including a top-level menu, data gathering modules for collecting user information, and action modules for processing reservations. Below is the complete YAML content for the chatbot.

### Top-Level Menu
```yaml
# -----> File: top_level.yaml <-----
modules:
- name: top-level
  kind: menu
  presentation: |
    Welcome to the Hotel Reservation Chatbot! I can help you book a hotel room. 
    Please let me know what you need assistance with.
  fallback: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please rephrase?

  items:
  - title: Make a Reservation
    memory: full
    kind: module
    reference: reservation_module
  - title: Frequently Asked Questions
    kind: module
    reference: faq_module
  - title: Welcome Message
    kind: answer
    answer: |
      Hello! I'm here to assist you with your hotel reservations. What can I help you with today?
```

### Reservation Module
```yaml
# -----> File: reservation_module.yaml <-----
modules:
- name: reservation_module
  kind: menu
  presentation: |
    In this module, you can provide the details for your hotel reservation.
  fallback: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please rephrase?

  items:
  - title: Gather Reservation Details
    memory: full
    kind: sequence
    references:
      - gather_dates
      - gather_room_type
      - gather_guest_info
      - confirm_reservation
```

### Gather Dates Module
```yaml
# -----> File: gather_dates.yaml <-----
name: gather_dates
kind: data_gathering
description: |
  Please provide the check-in and check-out dates for your hotel reservation.
data:
  - check_in_date: date
  - check_out_date: date

on-success:
  response:
    text: "You have selected check-in on {check_in_date} and check-out on {check_out_date}."
    rephrase: in-caller
```

### Gather Room Type Module
```yaml
# -----> File: gather_room_type.yaml <-----
name: gather_room_type
kind: data_gathering
description: |
  Please select the type of room you would like to reserve.
data:
  - room_type:
      type: enum
      values:
        - single
        - double
        - suite

on-success:
  response:
    text: "You have chosen a {room_type} room."
    rephrase: in-caller
```

### Gather Guest Info Module
```yaml
# -----> File: gather_guest_info.yaml <-----
name: gather_guest_info
kind: data_gathering
description: |
  Please provide your name and contact information for the reservation.
data:
  - guest_name: string
  - contact_number: string
  - email: string

on-success:
  response:
    text: "Thank you, {guest_name}. We will contact you at {contact_number} and {email} for your reservation."
    rephrase: in-caller
```

### Confirm Reservation Module
```yaml
# -----> File: confirm_reservation.yaml <-----
name: confirm_reservation
kind: action
data:
  - check_in_date: date
  - check_out_date: date
  - room_type:
      type: enum
      values:
        - single
        - double
        - suite
  - guest_name: string
  - contact_number: string
  - email: string

on-success:
  execute:
    language: python
    code: confirm_reservation.py
  response:
    text: "Your reservation for a {room_type} room from {check_in_date} to {check_out_date} has been confirmed. We will send the details to {email}."
    rephrase: simple
```

### FAQ Module
```yaml
# -----> File: faq_module.yaml <-----
name: faq_module
kind: question_answering
description: Frequently asked questions about hotel reservations.
questions:
- question: What is the cancellation policy?
  answer: You can cancel your reservation up to 24 hours before check-in without any charges.
- question: Do you offer breakfast?
  answer: Yes, breakfast is included in your stay.
- question: What time is check-in and check-out?
  answer: Check-in is at 3 PM and check-out is at 11 AM.
```

### Python Script for Confirming Reservation
```python
# -----> File: confirm_reservation.py <-----
def main(check_in_date, check_out_date, room_type, guest_name, contact_number, email):
    # Here you would typically process the reservation, e.g., save to a database
    print(f"Reservation confirmed for {guest_name}: {room_type} from {check_in_date} to {check_out_date}.")
    return f"Reservation confirmed for {guest_name}."

# Note: Ensure to include all necessary imports and logic as needed.
```

This YAML content defines a complete hotel reservation chatbot using Taskyto. You can copy and paste each section into your Taskyto project files. If you need further modifications or additional features, feel free to ask!
